title: User Onboarding Experience
context: Deep dive into the onboarding experience - understanding first impressions, learning curve, and early value realization.

questions.base_question_text: Think back to your very first session with the product. What do you remember about those first few minutes?
questions.research_objective: Capture raw first impressions and emotional response to initial product exposure

questions.base_question_text: How did you figure out what to do first? Was there anything that guided you, or did you explore on your own?
questions.research_objective: Understand the discovery process and effectiveness of onboarding guidance

questions.base_question_text: At what point did you feel like you 'got it' - that you understood how to use the product effectively?
questions.research_objective: Identify the 'aha moment' and time-to-value metrics from user perspective

questions.base_question_text: Was there anything during onboarding that confused you or made you hesitate?
questions.research_objective: Surface friction points and confusion in the early user journey

questions.base_question_text: If you were designing the first-time experience, what would you do differently?
questions.research_objective: Gather user-generated ideas for onboarding improvements
